function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unmitigated epidemic with predicted deaths","Impact":"High mortality rate","Mitigation":"Implementing mitigation measures to reduce the impact of the epidemic","Technologies":"Public health interventions, vaccination, testing and tracing","People":"General population","Owner":"Government, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Exceeding critical care bed capacity","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare systems and increased mortality","Mitigation":"Increasing critical care bed capacity, implementing triage protocols, and optimizing resource allocation","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote monitoring, healthcare management systems","People":"Healthcare providers, patients","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, government"}]}
